ygData.subject: Re: FULL LIST OF NEW ITEMS
ygData.msgSnippet: Is there any truth to that rumor about making a skull staff?  I have never seen one on E ci.  What s the story here folks? As far as armor, there is better
ygData.messageBody:
Is there any truth to that rumor about making a skull staff? I have
never seen one on E'ci. What's the story here folks?

As far as armor, there is better than woven, if you have the money or
ability to get it yourself. Gossimer and Damask are better than woven
in the cloth department. There are also mage-usable leather varieties
such as bear-hide and lupine. I don't know where to get it, but bone
armor is available from some mobs out in the Karanas.

For a one handed weapon, the new hot item is Dvinn's dagger, the
Dragoon Dirk. If you aren't capable of doing Dvinn yourself get a big
group that will dommit to staying through enough spawns to get one for
everyone. He is in the neighborhood of level 20 but hits much harder
than the average bear. Go to Crushbone and see what you can do.

Q

--- Tim Borelli <timb@...> wrote:
> From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>
>
> >1) Whats the best armor fer us Woven or Mesh?
>
> since we cant wear mesh, woven is the best =)
>

> can't use the totem now..
>
> good question. try and find one of them eluzive rare
> skull staves, or find
> the quest in S. Ro where you can supposedly take a
> runed staff and the
> skull, pay a guy 30gp and have him make you a skull
> staff...
>
> >3)Am i the only one that stay broke? I have never
> had more than 20pp.If not
> >whats the trick to make.
>
> what's yer level? i made 60 plat in a night at the
> aviak village and paw in
> s. karana.
>
